RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 58. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TECOLOTE DASH dueled, prevailed. EL GUY dueled, out kicked. SENATOR SCOOT spun out start, chased top two. AP SIGNATURE TRICK no excuses. IN THE ROCKIES broke in, brushed. LA PANAMITA LM didn't fire. MOONIN ENCORE hopped start, brushed. YES MIA off slow, raced green.

ENTRY.NAME: Senator Scoot
ENTRY.COMMENT: spun out start, chased top two

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 2 300 Y Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Purse 6300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 124 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SA SHEZA FAST MOON broke in, all out. DADDYS VELVET CARTEL broke in, bumped, gamely. J BEST QUEEN bumped, out kicked. MIDNIGHT SECRET pinballed, solid try. FELL OFF THE WAGON broke in, no menace. A MINI SECRET one paced. BACK TO FREE pinballed, no kick. OFFICE POOL no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Daddys Velvet Cartel
ENTRY.OWNER: Echerivel Augusto V and Cardenas Jose E

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 39. Maiden Claiming Purse 4800. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CREDIT RATING stalked pace, 4w, 3wturn, took command, cruised home. BIG JUAN co-led 2p, overtaken 3/16, grudgingly. CORTE tracked leaders, saved ground turn ,4w1/8, improved position. BIG BLUE OKIE off step slow, no speed, 4wupper, passed tiring rivals. SWAY BACK WHEN co-led inside, gave way. MAJOR TIMING off pace 3w, retreated.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Blue Okie
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, no speed, 4wupper, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Corte
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, saved ground turn ,4w1/8, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Credit Rating
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4w, 3wturn, took command, cruised home

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 86. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 6200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $3500 OR LESS IN 2022-2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $5000 OR COLORADO BRED CLAIMING PRICE $6250. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Pr ice $6,250.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THREE BALL went to the front to an unchallenged lead and set all the pace and won going away. NORTHERN QUEST was allowed to settle near the back to the final turn then moved up from three or four wide around the final turn, went four wide in upper stretch to make a late rally and proved second best. OREGON COUNTY raced in the middle of the pack around three first turn then made a mild bid down the backstretch, going three wide at the three furlong marker but flattened out. GOOSE DRANK WINE bobbled at the start and went five wide into the first turn, rushed up from three or four wide to be off the pace going into the backstretch, held that position through the final turn and tired. ITS FIVE SOMEWHERE was unhurried throughout and passed tiring rival. CHEF saved ground to no avail.

ENTRY.NAME: Goose Drank Wine
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, 5w1st turn, rush up, off pace, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Oregon County
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, mild bid 3w3/8, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Three Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: unchallenged lead, set pace, going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 8500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Colorado Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TOOTIE raced in the middle of the pack while saving ground to the quarter pole then tipped out to three wide to make a late run at the leader and drove past to prove best. QUEENS RANSOM had no early speed, made a mild rail bid going into the turn then tipped out at the three furlong marker and went four wide into the stretch to make a late rally to be up for the place. OLIVIAN sprinted to an unchallenged lead but was collared in the final yards and held on for the show. JUST REMEMBER was forwardly placed but lacked the late response in the stretch drive. SEGOVIANA was always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Queens Ransom
ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed, mild bid turn, 4wupper, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Tootie
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, middle of pack, 3wupper, late run, drove past

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 14500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VIRTUALLY stalked the pace from the inside down the backstretch then moved out to five wide at the three furlong marker and engaged the leader at the three sixteenths pole, dueled to the eighth pole and drew clear. RAY AREWETHEREYET went to the front to set most of the pace, was headed at the three furlong marker and matched strides with two outside rivals to the quarter pole and edged away but was re-challenged by the late closer, battled to the eighth pole and gave way grudgingly but was clearly second best. THE GINGER QUEEN (IRE) was rank early and settled in the middle of the pack around the first turn then moved up from four wide at the five furlong marker to vie for the lead at the half mile marker, dueled from three wide to the quarter pole and weakend. RED HOT MOON was off the pace from three wide down the backstretch then engaged the leader and match strides through the turn but gave way in the stretch. ALL NATIVE trailed the field and was outrun. INTO CLASSIC pressed the pace from the inside to the three furlong marker then dropped back, distanced and jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Virtually
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, inside, 5w3/8, engaged3/16, duel, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: The Ginger Queen (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank early, moved up 4w5/8, vied 1/2, duel to 1/4, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Into Classic
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, dropped back, distanced, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Ray Arewethereyet
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace, headed3/8, dueled, gave way grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Red Hot Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, engaged 3/8, dueled turn, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CTBA Mount Elbert S. ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 103. Stakes Purse 36843. PURSE $36,843. Three year olds and older Colorado Bred Colts and Geldings. Weight 124lbs. Nominations contact CTBA.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COLLUSIONIST was unhurried down the backstretch then was asked at the seven sixteenths from three wide and drove past the leaders at the quarter pole to prove best. TUFF WILLY TE was allowed to settle at or near the back through the turn while racing three to five wide, made a late five wide rally in the stretch to just get up for the place. HOYA PARANOYA pressed the pace from the two path down the backstretch then took a brief lead at the three furlong marker and was overtaken at the top of the stretch but was outfinished by late outside closer. TULSA TIME went to the front to set the early pressured pace to the three furlong marker and faded. MAIUS was off the pace while saving ground down the backstretch, fell back on the turn and failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Maius
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground, fell back turn, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Tulsa Time
ENTRY.OWNER: Vicchrilli Russell and McGregor Lynne M

ENTRY.NAME: Hoya Paranoya
ENTRY.OWNER: Wood Linda L and Yergensen Judi S

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Willy Te
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3-4w trip, late rally, up 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: ARAPAHOE PARK RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Purse 14500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST CALL went to a clear early lead down the backstretch then was challenged on the turn but edged away going into the stretch, was engaged at the eighth pole and fended off that challenged to prove best. HEY NOW stalked the pace from three wide to the five sixteenths pole then was asked at the quarter pole and engaged the leader, fought gamely down the stretch to be second best. RONAMO prompted the pace from the two path to the seven sixteenth pole, matched strides with the leader around the turn but was no match for the top two. SWEET MEDICINE was allowed to settle near the back and was not a threat. HOLD TIGHT trailed the field and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: First Call
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear early lead, duel turn, edged away, headed 1/8, dug in, best

ENTRY.NAME: Ronamo
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt pace 2w, dueled turn, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Now
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3w, coaxed 1/4, engaged 1/8, gamely, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Medicine
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, near back, no threat,
